titles.title: Protecting Americans from Drug Marketing Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny the deduction for advertising and promotional expenses for prescription pharmaceuticals.
Protecting Americans from Drug Marketing Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Protecting Americans from Drug Marketing Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny a business expense tax deduction for expenses relating to advertising or promoting the sale and use of prescription pharmaceuticals.
